HP HP Pro Tower 400 G9 Core i7 12th Gen Desktop PC with Windows 11 Pro

The HP Pro Tower 400 G9 Core i7 12th Gen Desktop PC is a powerful desktop computer designed for professional use. It features a high-performance Intel Core i7-12700 processor, which has a cache size of 25MB and operates at a base frequency of 2.10 GHz, with the ability to boost up to 4.90 GHz for demanding tasks. With 8GB of DDR4 3200MHz RAM, this PC offers sufficient memory for multitasking and running resource-intensive applications smoothly. The 1TB SSD storage provides ample space for storing files, documents, and media. The integrated Intel UHD Graphics 770 offers decent graphics capabilities, suitable for tasks such as video playback, photo editing, and casual gaming. While it may not handle high-end gaming or graphic-intensive workloads, it can handle everyday graphics requirements with ease. Included with the PC is a USB keyboard and mouse, providing a convenient and reliable input solution for your computing needs. The HP Pro Tower 400 G9 Core i7 12th Gen Desktop PC is a reliable and capable desktop computer that offers a powerful processor, sufficient memory, and ample storage for professional tasks. It is ideal for professionals who require a reliable and efficient machine for their work, and it can handle a wide range of applications and tasks with ease.

full_description:
HP Pro Tower 280 G9 Core i7 12th Gen 512GB SSD Desktop PC

The HP Pro Tower 280 G9 is a powerful and durable desktop computer that provides excellent performance and productivity. The PC is powered by a 12th-generation Intel Core i7 CPU with 12 cores and 20 threads that can reach 4.90 GHz. The PC also offers 8GB of DDR4 RAM that can be upgraded to 32GB and a 512GB NVMe PCIe SSD for quick and abundant storage. The PC includes an Intel UHD Graphics 730 chipset that can handle basic graphics operations and support multiple screens. The PC includes a DVD-RW optical drive as well as several ports and expansion slots for connectivity and expansion, including USB 3.0 Type-A, USB 2.0, USB 3.0 Type-C, HDMI, VGA, LAN, WiFi, Bluetooth, audio, PCI, and PCIe. The PC includes a TPM 2.0 security chip as well as a free-Dos operating system. The PC has a tower form factor and weighs 5.5kg. It measures 490x250x397mm. A USB keyboard and mouse are also included with the PC. The 180W power supply for the PC assures reliable and efficient operation. The HP Pro Tower 280 G9 is an excellent alternative for individuals seeking a fast and flexible desktop PC for use at work or at home.

HP Elite SFF 800 G9 Core i7 13th Gen Desktop PC

The HP Elite SFF 800 G9 Core i7 13th Gen Desktop PC has a powerful Intel Core i7-13700 CPU that can reach speeds of up to 5.2 GHz with Intel Turbo Boost Technology, as well as 16 cores and 24 threads, all managed by the Intel Q670 motherboard, making it excellent for vPro capabilities. Its 512 GB PCIe NVMe SSD provides plenty of storage and quick access to data, and its 16 GB DDR4-3200 MHz non-ECC RAM guarantees seamless multitasking. The in-built Intel UHD Graphics 770 takes care of graphics. The audio codec of the HP Elite SFF 800 G9 Core i7 13th Gen Desktop PC is the Realtek ALC3252, which supports universal audio jacks. With features like HP Secure Erase, HP Sure Click, Trusted Platform Module TPM 2.0, and more, security is strong even on Windows 11 Pro. The HP Desktop PC has internal disk bays that provide several storage configurations in addition to multiple PCIe and M.2 expansion slots. HP Elite Mini 800 G9 Core i7 13th Gen Desktop PC

The HP Elite Mini 800 G9 Core i7 13th Generation Desktop PC is a powerful and small computer device designed for professional use. With an Intel Core i7-13700T CPU that has 16 cores and 24 threads and can reach 4.9 GHz thanks to Intel Turbo Boost Technology, it provides outstanding performance for demanding workloads and multitasking. With a 512 GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD and 16 GB of fast DDR5-4800 MHz RAM, the HP Elite Mini 800 G9 Core i7 13th Gen Desktop PC guarantees steady performance and enough of room for your data and applications. Visuals are sharp thanks to the integrated Intel UHD Graphics 770, and audio is clear thanks to the Realtek ALC3252 codec and its universal audio connector. It guarantees data protection and integrity with a variety of security features, such as HP BIOSphere Gen6, HP Secure Erase, and HP Sure Click, in addition to hardware-level security measures, including Trusted Platform Module TPM 2.0. SuperSpeed USB ports, HDMI, DisplayPort, RJ-45, expansion slots for more storage and M.2 devices, and other easy connectivity options are all included in the HP Elite Mini 800 G9 Desktop PC. Modern organizations demanding performance, security, and flexibility find it to be the perfect fit because to its small form factor and flexible I/O.
